member.name: M:VersioningTasks.CompareFiles.FastFileEqualityCheck(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether a file is up to date with respect to another, based on existence, last write time and file size.
member.returns: true if the files are the same; false if the files are different

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.CompareFiles.OriginalItems
member.summary: One set of items to compare.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.CompareFiles.NewItems
member.summary: The other set of items to compare.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.CompareFiles.AreSame
member.summary: Gets whether the items lists contain items that are identical going down the list.

member.name: M:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.Version
member.summary: Gets the version string to use in the compiled assemblies.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.SimpleVersion
member.summary: Gets the version string to use in the official release name (lacks revision number).

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.MajorMinorVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the major.minor version string.
member.value: The x.y string (no build number or revision number).

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.PrereleaseVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the prerelease version, or empty if this is a final release.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.OAuth2PackagesVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version string to use for NuGet packages containing OAuth 2 components.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.GitCommitId
member.summary: Gets the Git revision control commit id for HEAD (the current source code version).

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.BuildNumber
member.summary: Gets the build number (JDate) for this version.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.VersionFile
member.summary: The file that contains the version base (Major.Minor.Build) to use.

member.name: P:VersioningTasks.GetBuildVersion.GitRepoRoot
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent directory of the .git directory.
